description: Scandinavian states have reported elevated, but not dangerous, radiation levels in the atmosphere.
title: Russia denies its nuclear plants are source of radiation leak
title_page: Russia denies its nuclear plants are source of radiation leak - BBC News
maintext: But in a statement, Russia's nuclear energy body said its two power stations in the north-west - the Leningrad NPP and the Kola NPP - were working normally and that no leaks had been reported.
